Text:
yo hmv what exactly do you connect to make the vinyl rip.

I got an RCA cable plugged into the line in of my soundcard and connected to the tape out of my phono preamp, and the preamp is connected to the turntable


Can you give me detailed steps includng which program to use to do this shit up

it goes as follows:
1. Turntable
2. Phono Reciever
3. RCA to Mini adaptor
4. Soundcard
5. Sony Sound Forge 10.0
6. uTorrent
7. The Pirate Bay

6 and 7 were a joke :P

i dunno.. if I find time I may put together a step by step video on my methods. (just picked up an HD camera :D)

let me know what u guys think...

would be nice if you upload a video showing step by step. few days ago I wrote a post about how to record vinyl to pc and a lot of people wanna khow how. I also put a link for HMVinyl, sure. check it out (but it?s in portuguese, from brasil)
